text: P. R. Varalakshmi is an Indian film actress and television actress. She was active in movies during the 1970s and 1980s. She was a prominent lead actress during the 1980s in Malayalam, Tamil, Kannada, and Telugu films. She has acted around 350 movies in all major south Indian languages. Her debut film was Vazhaiyadi Vazhai in 1972, directed by K. S. Gopalakrishnan. She has acted with former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Puratchi Thalaivar MGR, former Tamil Nadu Chief minister Amma J . Jayalalitha and Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister NT Rama Rao. She has also acted with 2 Generations actors, with Sri . Muthuraman and his son Sri Karthik, Sri. Sivaji Ganesan and his son Sri. Prabhu, Telugu superstar Sri. Krishna and his son Sri. Mahesh Babu. During her period she has acted as Heroine to famous heroes Sri. Gemini Ganesan, Sri. Kamal Hassan, Sri Muthuraman, Sri.
